column1: YOUR OWN SODA MAKER: We love to drink a soda as a replacement for coffee on a hot day. But the problem is that most of these carbonated drinks are packed with high sugar or fructose. So
column2: why not make your own soda at home? With Savvy’s Soda/Drink maker
column3: you can now control and prepare the carbonated drinks
column4: all the while by helping environment as there is no need for you to recycle the soda cans and bottles.   MATERIAL: Our soda maker comes with everything you need to prepare fresh carbonated beverages at home. It is stylish
column5: compact and easy to operate model. The package includes a sparkling water maker
column7: a pet bottle and a warranty card. The product is made of safe ABS plastic material and is available in black color.   SIMPLE: The home soda machine has a simple but essential function- that is it uses CO2 cartridge to carbonate water in no time. Well
column8: the more positive aspect of their simplicity is that they do not need to be powered in any way-neither by batteries nor by electricity!   ENJOY YOUR FIZZY DRINKS: Are you trying to cut your sugar intake
column9: but want to control what flavors you put in? Try our soda maker and you will definitely think that making fizzy drinks couldn’t be any easier! This kitchen necessity is so perfect for those who like to drink carbonated beverages regularly.   ELEGANT DESIGN: This sleek and elegant design will be the most suitable addition to your kitchen countertop. This economical and convenient gift box size machine is perfect to take with you for tripping. It can also make a great housewarming gift for your friends and family.

column1: Mr. Butlers Soda-maker Accessory Pack - Co2 Gas Cylinder and BPA-Free 500 ml Orange Bottle (Multicolour)

Pack contains one CO2 cylinder and one Orange colour BPA Free PET Bottle 500ml.   One Mr. Butler CO2 cylinder makes approximately 125 glasses of soda or around 20-25 Litres of soda.   Cylinder Capacity - 270gm CO2.   Bottle can be used for up to 3 years for making Soda and for longer periods as water bottle.   Once empty
column2: the cylinder can be exchanged for refills at a store close to you.
